title: Fritz Joachim Weyl
summary: Fritz Joachim Weyl (February 19, 1915 â€“ July 20, 1977) was born in Zurich, Switzerland.[1]  Today Weyl is regarded as a renowned mathematician.  During his lifetime he taught at many universities, significantly contributed to research in mathematics and came to be very well respected.  One of the universities he taught at was the George Washington University (GW or GWU), in Washington, D.C.
